title: Blac Chyna takes Dream Kardashian to watch son King Cairo play soccer
text:
Blac Chyna attended her son King Cairo's soccer game in Woodland Hills, California on Sunday. His father Tyga was not seen.

Also with the 31-year-old model was the daughter she had with Rob Kardashian: Dream, aged two.

And there was another person around the music video star. She was seen alongside 27-year-old rapper Sage The Gemini - whose real name is Dominic Wynn Woods - from Fairfield, California.

Soccer mom: Blac Chyna wore a matching black windbreaker set to her son's soccer game in Woodland Hills on Saturday

The model wore a black windbreaker that was fully zipped to her neck and matching sweats.

Her pants featured a thick white stripe running down the sides, while her jacket had stripes angled toward her chest.

She paired the look with black and white low top Chanel sneakers and a white makeup case-style crossbody bag.

Chyna (born Angela Renée White) donned a waist-length black hair style with bangs reaching past her eye brows.

Friends or more? She was spotted on the sidelines with rapper Sage the Gemini

No photos: Ready for a long game, she sat in a pop-up red chair and seemed to scowl at photographers

Little sis: Her daughter Dream Kardashian also joined her mom at the game

The mother-of-two seemed to go fresh-faced for the afternoon in the park.

Her rapper friend - who used to date Jordin Sparks - donned ripped skinny jeans and a long sleeve black shirt, along with a few gold chains.

Ready for a long game, she sat in a pop-up red chair and seemed to scowl at photographers.

At one point she tied her two-year-old daughter's shoe laces.

The toddler was seen running around the park in two different outfits. She first was spotted in a long sleeve shirt and full length leggings.

Outfit change: The toddler was seen running around the park in two different outfits

Help? At one point she used the calculator on her mom's phone to write '911' and hold it toward the field

She seemed to need a cooler second outfit, changing into a long sleeve shirt, denim vest and shorts.

The young girl seemed to be having a blast as she ran and twirled on the grass. At one point she used the calculator on her mom's phone to write '911' and hold it toward the field.

She welcomed Dream in November 2016 with her ex-Rob Kardashian.

The two had an an-again off-again relationship beginning in 2016 and ultimately concluding in early 2017. Their relationship came after she had a long term relationship with Tyga, and he moved on with Kylie Jenner.

Spin time: The young girl seemed to be having a blast as she ran and twirled on the grass, her father is Rob Kardashian

Star: King Cairo aged six, seemed laser focused as he ran around the field with his teammates

Chyna's rise to fame began years ago when she was a stripper on the East Coast before being hand selected for a starring role in Tyga's music video for the hit song Rack City.

The pair began a relationship shortly after and she gave birth to King in October 2012.

Their son, aged six, seemed laser focused as he ran around the field with his teammates.
description: Blac Chyna was in full mom-mode on Saturday at her son King Cairo's soccer game. The 31-year-old wore a matching black co-ord while she sat on the side lines with her daughter Dream.
